# UIImage.SymbolScale.large

**Case**

The large variant of the symbol image.

## Declaration

```swift
case large
```

## Symbol image scales

- **UIImage.SymbolScale.default**: The default scale variant that matches the system usage.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.unspecified**: An unspecified scale.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.small**: The small variant of the symbol image.
- **UIImage.SymbolScale.medium**: The medium variant of the symbol image
